caption: The FBI raided the CDC in the middle of the night to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism.

result.explanation: The image shows the CDC building.  The caption mentions an FBI raid, which is not depicted in the image. While the CDC is clearly visible, the absence of any indication of an FBI raid lowers confidence. The entities "FBI" and "CDC" are correctly identified, but their interaction as described in the caption is not visually confirmed.

candidates.title: Did the FBI Raid the CDC for Data on Vaccines and Autism?
candidates.content:
This morning President Trump ordered the CDC Headquarters in Atlanta to be raided at 3:00 Am Their Time.
Although Unconfirmed the CDC did tell me on the phone a few minutes ago: "We Are Not Allowed To Comment On That.Please Email me and we will give you a statement about it. "
I also had 36 Posts on my video 10 minutes before it was posted...
Long before the Employees began showing up to work the FBI was busting down doors and seizing computers.
Accompanying these FBI Agents was Dr William Thompson  who is a CDC Whistle Blower.
The raid was ordered by the President and was led by Sally Yates - Acting Attorney General and part of the King and Spalding Law Group, which was also working with President Trumps huge law firm: Jones Day.
All of the records for the Vaccines - what is in them, what they have done to people across the globe - it is all being seized as you read this.
As soon as President Obama took office he granted both the CDC and Monsanto protection in their massive use of GMO Foods and Vaccines to kill people world wide. That protection is now gone. The employees involved in murder and disabling people world wide have two choices: Become a whistle blower or face 20 years to life in prison.
There is no place you can hide on this planet or in this planet.
So what is in Vaccines that make them so deadly???
Of the 202 children we have worked with 2 were autistic due to Vaccines given to the Mothers while she was in the military. The other 200 became autistic the day they were vaccinated and all have Indigo Aura ... Those with Chrystaline Auras were killed outright. This author has a Chrystaline Aura.
candidates.description: A known hoax purveyor spread false claims the FBI "raided" the CDC in the middle of the night for data on vaccines and autism on the order of President Trump.

result.explanation: The claim is thoroughly debunked by Snopes, a reputable fact-checking website.  The article details how the claim originated from a hoax purveyor and presents it as a false narrative.  There is no credible evidence supporting a midnight FBI raid on the CDC to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism.
result.supporting_points: Source 1 (Snopes): "A known hoax purveyor spread false claims the FBI "raided" the CDC in the middle of the night for data on vaccines and autism on the order of President Trump."

final_result.explanation: The claim made in the caption is demonstrably false based on both internal and external validation.  The internal check correctly identifies the CDC building in the image but notes the absence of any evidence supporting the claim of an FBI raid.  This aligns perfectly with the external check, which cites Snopes, a reputable fact-checking website, to definitively debunk the claim.  Snopes provides clear evidence that the claim originated from a known hoax purveyor and lacks any credible supporting evidence.  There is no conflict between the internal and external checks; both independently and strongly support the conclusion that the caption is out of context. The high confidence scores (8 from the internal check and 10 from the external check) further solidify this conclusion.  The external validation's confidence score of 10 reflects the definitive nature of the debunking provided by Snopes, while the internal check's score of 8 accounts for the visual aspect which confirms the presence of the CDC but lacks any depiction of the purported FBI raid.  No additional entity analysis is needed to resolve discrepancies as both checks are in perfect agreement regarding the falsity of the caption.  In summary, the evidence overwhelmingly demonstrates that the caption is entirely fabricated and has no basis in reality.
final_result.validation_summary: Both internal and external checks strongly and consistently confirm that the caption is out of context. The internal check points out the lack of visual evidence of an FBI raid, while the external check uses a reputable source (Snopes) to definitively debunk the claim as a hoax.
